message.content:
I need to identify the line item that represents costs of general management and administration of the entity as a whole.

Looking at the income statement:
1. "Administrative Expenses" would be the line item that corresponds to general management and administration costs
2. The value shown for "Administrative Expenses" is 250651.94

This matches the task's requirement to identify costs related to general management and administration of the entity as a whole.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '250651.94'}}
```
